remarks: Part of Lemma F in [Crawley] p. 116.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2013.)
statement:
cdlemf1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemf1.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemf1.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemf1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemf2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemf2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( U e. A /\ U .<_ W ) ) -> E. p e. A E. q e. A ( ( -. p .<_ W /\ -. q .<_ W ) /\ U = ( ( p .\/ q ) ./\ W ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ p q $.
$d A p q $.
$d H p q $.
$d K p q $.
$d U p q $.
$d W p q $.
